parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the lighting control module can cause the headlights, taillights, and other exterior lights to malfunction or fail, leading to reduced visibility and increased risk of accidents, especially at night.
symptoms: Headlights and/or taillights do not turn on
dim
or shut off while driving
parking lights do not function
dash lights illuminate incorrectly
and the vehicle may experience intermittent electrical issues.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the headlights can cause reduced visibility and increased risk of accidents, especially at night.
symptoms: Headlights do not turn on
dim
or shut off while driving
and the vehicle may experience intermittent electrical issues.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of Ford to provide timely and effective recall repairs can lead to continued safety risks and frustration for vehicle owners.
symptoms: Vehicle owners experience delays or denials of recall repairs
and may be forced to pay for repairs out of pocket.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The cracked steel wheels can cause rapid air loss, leading to loss of vehicle control, accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Slow air leaks
nibble in steering
difficulty in balancing tires
rapid air loss
vibration while driving
and cracked or split rims.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear axle bearing can cause the axle to fracture, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Loud rumbling or grinding noise from the rear of the vehicle
vibration
and smoke coming from the rear axle area.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clutch hydraulic system can cause the clutch pedal to stick to the floor, making it difficult or impossible to shift gears, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: Soft or spongy clutch pedal
clutch pedal sticks to the floor
clutch pedal does not return to its normal position
clutch pedal has a delayed return to its normal position
clutch pedal has a sudden loss of pressure
vehicle is unable to shift into gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The airbag light being on can indicate a faulty airbag system, which can lead to failure to deploy in the event of an accident, potentially causing injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Airbag light on
alarm will not set after the vehicle is shut off
lights inside the truck stay on for 30 minutes.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the suspension can cause loss of control, accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Loud banging or clunking noise from the suspension
vehicle tilts or leans to one side
difficulty steering.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the light control module can cause the headlights and high beam headlights to fail, reducing visibility and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Headlights and high beam headlights do not work.
